required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study to Assess the Efficacy and Safety of Paricalcitol in the Treatment of Chronic Kidney Disease With Secondary Hyperparathyroidism
clinical_study.official_title: A Multi-center, Randomized, Double-blind, Three-arm, Parallel Grouping, Placebo-controlled Phase 3 Study to Assess the Efficacy and Safety of Paricalcitol Soft Capsules in the Treatment of Secondary Hyperparathyroidism in Subjects With Stage 3 and Stage 4 Chronic Kidney Disease

brief_summary.textblock: The study is being conducted to evaluate the efficacy, and safety of Paricalcitol for secondary hyperparathyroidism with stage 3 and stage 4 chronic kidney disease in adults.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: A multi-center, randomized, double-blind, three-arm, parallel grouping, placebo-controlled phase 3 study
study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: Percentage of participants with >30% decrease from basline at least twice in mean iPTH during the efficacy assessment phase.

secondary_outcome.measure: The value of iPTH for each visit
The change from baseline of iPTH for each visit
The change percentage of iPTH for each visit;
The proportion of subjects whose iPTH has been reduced by more than 30% from baseline at least 4 consecutive times;
The change value of blood bone metabolism index from baseline;
The change percentage of blood bone metabolism index from baseline;
The change value of urine bone metabolism index from baseline;
The change percentage of urine bone metabolism index from baseline;
The change value in blood calcium from baseline;
The change value in blood phosphorus from baseline;
The change value in calcium-phosphorus product from baseline;
The change value of 24-hour urine calcium from baseline;
The change value of 24-hour urine phosphorus from baseline;
The change value of 24-hour creatinine clearance rate from baseline;
The change value of eGFR from baseline;
The change value in urine calcium/creatinine ratio from baseline.

intervention.description: Treatment group A: Paricalcitol 1μg QD Treatment group B: Paricalcitol 2μg TIW
Treatment group C: Placebo to match Paricalcitol，QD or TIW
